name: arcibi
text: Now that is a threat

name: peterjoel
text: When most people make threats like that and you can laugh it off. It's a different proposition with Nice Pete; Nice Pete does not believe in the Sin of sayin' lies.

name: hyetal
text: This summarizes Nice Pete very well.

name: hyetal
text: And Pat, come to think of it.

name: ajesteronly
text: Did... Did your avatar just... blink at me??

name: ajesteronly
text:
IT DID.

I totally thought I was losing my everloving mind just then.

name: edana
text: I definitely just had a staring contest with that avatar.

name: jimmyk
text: That avatar scares the crap out of me, for some reason. I even jumped when I knew it was coming...

name: howard
text: Nice Pete Does Not Appreciate Criticism.

name: lawbot
text: This is not true. He has asked for it before, I think he just knows that Pat is a dick.

name: killingthejay
text: he's asked for it, but he didn't take it well.

name: cracklewater
text: His experience with Blister - especially the fact that he was unable to visit bloody retribution upon an already-dead critic - has soured Pete on the whole process.

name: rascaldom
text: The title of Nice Pete's next book, I assume.

name: archimedes2000
text: i found your face, it was in my mind.

name: phoenixultima
text: The last panel dialogue needs to be put on a shirt.

name: overmedicated
text: Amen to that. I already have it written very badly on my bedroom wall in masonry paint.

name: lexsenthur
text: Yes..."paint".

name: fattypneumonia
text: Gotta keep the wall wet...or the monster will escape.

name: nek314
text: Nice JTHM reference. Here, have a chubby.

name: terriblerobot
text: Yes indeed. Chubbies for everyone

name: lux
text: Manson ry, more like.

name: presterjohn
text: It would fit in here.

name: firesign
text: Dude, the only way Roast Beef would buy that shirt is if someone had just threatened Weldon right before he went online shopping...

name: boredom_man
text: Or a thong.

name: johnnyelectrifying
text: A comment left by johnnyelectrifying was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, blastradius, Vondicus, fosters, atticusonline, Art-Vader, BrianNotBrian, aesop_punk, Afkpuz, DanS, nutmeg, bixschmix, Xaxx, STUART)

name: saint
text: I have seen enough. I will kill his parents.

name: petitegitan
text: Finally someone is scaring Pat!

name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, tekende, blastradius, Jesler729, SaintTim, fosters, gormster, farqussus, stop, atticusonline, erinye, Xaxx, scraggg, ford, philosophe)

name: gompo
text: I like to imagine Pat meeting artistic greats from all of history, pointing at their magnum opuses and asking them if they thought they could just fool around.

name: atticusonline
text: A comment left by atticusonline was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ariamaki, trisha, Cracklewater, jezebel)

name: kylemcjuicy
text: I love the capitals on Ask and Assume.

name: achilleselbow
text: I've been reading chronologically, and I'm pretty sure the last Nice Pete strip (where he and Pat are at the therapy session) is where this capitalization of verbs starting with "A" began. I wonder if Pete will retain this idiosyncrasy throughout.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i never Saw that before.

name: cracklewater
text:
I don't think Pete's vocal capitalisation is alphabetical. It seems to be applied to things he considers Important.

Also: where does Pete live these days? Pat and Rod seem to share a house, so is Pete their rarely-seen roomie?

On one hand, Rod seems too level-headed to stand for such a thing. On the other, Pete definitely has an appreciation for Men having Times of Men (not to mention good Country etiquette), so maybe he makes an excellent flatmate?

name: subactuality
text: I can hear the capitals in my head. What does this mean?

name: blastradius
text: A comment left by blastradius was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by solobuttons, JuanCarlos, Darthemed)

name: andyetandyet
text: for that matter, how do pat's glasses stay on?

name: tourach3
text: electromagnets.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Note to self: Do not Assume serial killers want you to criticize their writing.

name: katsura
text: For some reason, I'm wholly amused that this is the strip that opens up the volume 7 book.

name: werthog42
text: Panel 8 makes for a nice away message, especially when used on people who don't understand what auto-reply is.

name: pitseleh
text:
Alt text: "Grade school would have been so much more interesting if we had had lines like this"

This is so very true.

name: phthoggos
text: I thought it said "grad school" for a while

name: tekende
text: It works either way, really.

name: 60teeth
text: Nice Pete's face in the last panel is the angriest face.

name: hassanoleary
text:
Pat's reaction here is fascinating. On one hand, he displays his typical arrogant and vicious sense of smug cultural superiority (echoed in other strips by his insistence that Beef rent his Noam Chomsky dvd and Pat's apparent preference for "intelligent" programming). On the other hand, he plays the ultimate philistine card by describing Picasso's work as "weird crap."

Pat is such a dick it boggles the mind. He manages to be an uncouth dick and a couth-and-don't-you-forget-it dick in the same strip!

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pumpinpedal, mashisoyo, puguglypress)

name: onepapertiger
text:
Fuck you. Cubism is ridiculous in its influence. I wrote a paper on that shit and keep the research articles in a drawer. Fuckin, Demoiselles de Avignon scared the bejesus out of those people with good reason: it was three-dimensional art snuck into two dimensions.
Dali was interesting, but don't mouth off about things you can't reference.

name: onepapertiger
text:
Ahhh it is late (birds starting to chirp) and I am worn out, stoned. Apologies about this half-coherent slur.
I do stand by the "dimensions" bit, however.

name: even_deader
text: Soticoto: he was never a couth dick.

name: i_love_kate
text: If anyone can find a strip in which Pat is more hateful than in panel four here, I will reward them in theory.

name: howard
text: I submit panel seven.

name: lux
text: I submit his blog.

name: ketelcat
text: I agree! That finger-wagging thing...oooooh >=|

name: endoftheworld
text: The text from panel four, along with an animated .gif made from the Daedalus_X strip, was my avatar for the longest time. One of the few tangible benefits from a humanities degree is knowing when not to spend your money on what is obviously a bad job.

name: andrew_
text: what the fuck is up with Pat's arm in panel 7?

name: i_love_kate
text: Good point. It looks from the angle like his arm is emerging from his groin.

name: phthoggos
text: Good call, I guess Onstad momentarily that anatomy was a thing.

name: peterjoel
text: The "K" indicates that Nice Pete has grabbed Pat's arm German style - KLAMP.

name: soticoto
text: For some reason I am fascinated by Nice Pete's lower jaw being under his upper while Pat's lower being over his upper.

name: bluecarrot
text: I knew someone who would look over my shoulders and  edit my papers as I was writing them. I wish I still lived with her, so I could use this line from the last panel.

name: dwodles
text: Nice Pete has fantastic retorts.

name: woodenteeth
text: There's only one Achewood character that I would like to see immeasureably removed from the strip... Pat, you win this honour.

name: direhaggis
text: Pat actually looks conciliatory in the last panel. To think it only took an occasionally mild-mannered serial killer to pull it off.

name: charchar
text: Nice Pete, why do I love you so?

name: tehloki
text: nuh-uh, mister! *twirls finger*

name: gopacapulco
text: Pat's so much more of an ASS than Pete. But Pete would kill him if need be

name: kinghaggard
text: Man look at Nice Pete's face in that first panel. He's staring at Pat's hand as if it were reaching for his momma's throat.

name: mangecoeur
text: You know he really means it

name: poodlelucy
text: i find nice pete's armpit hair in panel three to be disturbing.

name: lolsworth
text: That is how to deal with critics

name: g-money
text:
Real alt text:
I'm gonna punch the farts outta you

name: phantomsword
text:
god, pat is a dick... Yes i know this has been stated many a time before but still...Jesus.

It seems that nice Pete is getting a weensy bit more or less sane.
